segments.text: I can’t believe how the woman just keeps drying that plate without a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t she see the overflow pooling around her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if she’s in her own little bubble, completely disconnected from her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, her children are being reckless right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically teetering off that stool, and I feel my heart race every time he stretches for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so expectant, her little hand reaching up in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could intervene without startling the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a small moment, yet it carries so much weight with the risk of injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but think about how quickly things could go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s both an endearing and nerve-wracking sight to behold.
segments.speaker: PAR
